affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.
notes:
This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most 525/500 behind it.
Shackleshot cannot be disjointed.
cmb:
90/100/110/120
12
lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
name: windrunner_shackleshot

affects:
ABILITY: Channeled, Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 10%.
notes: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.
cmb:
90/100/110/120
9
lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
name: windrunner_powershot

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
notes:
The slow will affect enemies with spell immunity.
Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
attrib:
MOVE SPEED BONUS: 50%/50%/50%/50%
EVASION: 100%
ENEMY SLOW: 8%/16%/24%/30%
ENEMY SLOW RADIUS: 300/300/300/300
DURATION: 3/4/5/6
cmb:
100/100/100/100
15
lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
name: windrunner_windrun

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Windranger channels the wind to gain 500 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with reductions to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced. Lasts 20 seconds.
Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Can target buildings and Spell Immune units.
attrib:
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 500
DAMAGE REDUCTION: 50%/40%/30%
DURATION: 20
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 15/15/15
SCEPTER DAMAGE REDUCTION: 30%/15%/0%
cmb:
75/100/125
60
lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
name: windrunner_focusfire
